info.title: Database Threat Detection Policy APIs
info.description: Provides create, read and update functionality for Azure SQL database Threat Detection policies.

get.description: Get a Threat Detection policy associated with an Azure SQL database.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database on which the Azure SQL Database is hosted.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL database for which database Threat Detection policy is defined.

parameters.name: securityAlertPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the Threat Detection policy. Default is the currently value to use.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the database Threat Detection policy.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 500 GetDatabaseSecurityAlertPolicyFailed - Failed to get database Threat Detection security alert policies. * 500 DatabaseIsUnavailable - Your settings are currently unavailable, please try again later

put.description: Creates or updates a Threat Detection policy for an Azure SQL database.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL Database on which the Azure SQL Database is hosted.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure SQL database for which database Threat Detection policy is defined.

parameters.name: securityAlertPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the Threat Detection policy. Default is the currently value to use.

200.description: Successfully updated the database Threat Detection policy.

201.description: Successfully created the database Threat Detection policy.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 500 UpsertDatabaseSecurityAlertPolicyFailed - An error has occurred while saving Threat detection settings, please try again later * 500 DatabaseIsUnavailable - Your settings are currently unavailable, please try again later

name.description: The name of the SKU, typically, a letter + Number code, e.g. P3.

tier.description: The tier of the particular SKU, e.g. Basic, Premium.

DatabaseSecurityAlertPolicyResource.description: Contains information about an Azure SQL Database Threat Detection policy.

DatabaseSecurityAlertPolicyProperties.description: Properties for an Azure SQL Database Threat Detection policy.

state.description: Specifies the state of the policy. Options are Enabled or Disabled.

disabledAlerts.description: Specifies the comma-separated list of alerts that are disabled. The possible values are:  Sql_Injection, Sql_Injection_Vulnerability, Access_Anomaly, Usage_Anomaly or empty string

emailAddresses.description: Specifies the semicolon-separated list of e-mail addresses to which the alert is sent.

emailAccountAdmins.description: Specifies that the alert is sent to the account administrators. Options are Enabled or Disabled.

storageEndpoint.description: Specifies the blob storage endpoint (e.g. https://MyAccount.blob.core.windows.net). This blob storage will hold all Threat Detection audit logs.

storageAccountAccessKey.description: Specifies the identifier key of the Threat Detection audit storage account.

retentionDays.description: Specifies the number of days to keep in the Threat Detection audit logs.

useServerDefault.description: Specifies whether to use the default server policy. Options are Enabled or Disabled.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

ResourceGroupParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupParameter.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.
